definitions.definition: The lowermost part of a doorway that one crosses to enter; a sill .
An entrance ; the door or gate of a house.
The outset of something; the point of entry , or the beginning of an action .
The start of the landing area of a runway .
The quantitative point at which an action is triggered, especially a lower limit .
The wage or salary at which income tax becomes due.
The point where one is mentally or physically vulnerable in response to a provocation or to other nuisances.

main_definition: The lowermost part of a doorway that one crosses to enter; a sill .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) An entrance ; the door or gate of a house.
( by extension ) Any end or boundary .
( figurative ) The outset of something; the point of entry , or the beginning of an action .
( aviation ) The start of the landing area of a runway .
( engineering ) The quantitative point at which an action is triggered, especially a lower limit .
The wage or salary at which income tax becomes due.
The point where one is mentally or physically vulnerable in response to a provocation or to other nuisances.
